Generation III.Ruby: Plusle always acts as a cheerleader for its partners. Whenever a teammate puts out a good effort in battle, this Pok é mon shorts out its body to create the crackling noises of sparks to show its joy.
Generation III.Sapphire: When Plusle is cheering on its partner, it flashes with electric sparks from all over its body. If its partner loses, this Pok é mon cries loudly.
Generation III.Emerald: It has the trait of cheering on its fellow Pok é mon . By shorting out the electricity it releases from its paws, it creates pom-poms for cheering.
Generation III.FireRed: It cheers on partners while scattering sparks from its body. It climbs telephone poles to absorb electricity.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It cheers on partners while scattering sparks from its body. It climbs telephone poles to absorb electricity.
